name: UserInvitation.Attributes
desc: Attributes that describe a User Invitations resource.

items.name: email
items.desc: The email address of a pending user invitation. The email address must be valid to activate the account. It can be any email address, not necessarily one associated with an Apple ID.

items.name: firstName
items.desc: The first name of the user with the pending user invitation.

items.name: lastName
items.desc: The last name of the user with the pending user invitation.

items.name: roles
items.desc: Assigned user roles that determine the user's access to sections of App Store Connect and tasks they can perform.

items.name: expirationDate
items.desc: The expiration date of the pending invitation.

items.name: provisioningAllowed
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the user's specified role allows access to the provisioning functionality on the Apple Developer website.

items.name: allAppsVisible
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a user has access to all apps available to the team.
